pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Nonparametric Methods. An Approach Based on Spatial Signs and Ranks // Multivariate tests, estimates and methods based on the identity score, spatial sign score and spatial rank score are provided. The methods include one and c-sample problems, shape estimation and testing, linear regression and principal components. The methodology is described in Oja (2010) doi:10.1007/978-1-4419-0468-3 and Nordhausen and Oja (2011) doi:10.18637/jss.v043.i05.
